subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The first test will be Sunday, a 138.9-mile trek from Rotterdam to Brussels in which riders will have to deal with the crosswinds off the North Sea.
snippet: The first test will be Sunday, a 138.9-mile trek from Rotterdam to Brussels in which riders will have to deal with the crosswinds off the North Sea.
